title: copy_files_to_archive Lambda Input['Records']['body']
description: A dict created by converting a string.

job_id.description: The unique id of the recovery job.

granule_id.description: The unique ID of the granule.

filename.description: The name of the file being copied.

source_key.description: The path the file was restored to.

target_key.description: The path to copy to. Defaults to value at 'source_key'.

restore_destination.description: The name of the bucket the restored file will be moved to.

source_bucket.description: Set by moveGranules. The bucket the restored file can be copied from.
